import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor() { } }

Hi, I'm Allen Firth.

I’m a full-stack software developer and architect with a passion for building things with code.

Intro

I’ve been developing applications for over two decades now.

I build with C#, Angular / React, relational or document databases, Microsoft Azure & Azure DevOps

I’ve worked for small startups and I’ve worked for global multi-national corporations.

About Skills Experience Contact CV
